sources.title: 1957 - Short Cut to Hell - Atajo al infierno - James Cagney - VOSE

metadata.Plot: A professional hitman is hired by a friend to commit two murders. His friend pays him off in what turns out to be stolen money, and the police soon trace the money to him. On the run, he kidnaps the girlfriend of the police detective in charge of his pursuit and threatens to kill her unless the hunt is called off.
metadata.Writer: Graham Greene, Ted Berkman, Raphael Blau
metadata.Actors: William Bishop, Robert Ivers, Georgann Johnson
